name: You Have To Debug!!!
description:
One fatal misclick later, and your computer is full of bugs! Your debugging AI will help you through the process, but because you have encountered these same problems so many times, it won't be nice about helping you out. 

This is a simple point and click game where all you need is your mouse and left click to play. You will receive instructions from a notepad in the top-right corner on how to proceed.

Roles:

Tony Le - Design, Programming

Cason Jolly - Design, Art, Sound
